entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
